source: The traitor left his armies dying where they lay when he saw that he would not keep my forces back. Kalitath disappeared in the confusion of the war, but I don’t care now. Shall he flee and be forgotten for all times as a tribal leader that would not bow before the wooden throne, that is mine to take now.
target: Dh’fhàg an cealgair na daoine aige gus am faigheadh iad bàs far an robh iad ’nan laighe nuair a mhothaich e nach b’ urrainn dha mo chumail air ais. Theich Kalitath ann an ùpraid a’ chogaidh ach tha mi coma a-nis. Gun teicheadh e ’s gun rachadh e a-mach à cuimhne gu bràth mar an ceannard nach gèilleadh fon chathair fhiodha a ghabhas mi fhìn a-nis.

source: Still, I saw no way that I could erase my shame without fighting against these Barbarians. So, I left Fremil by boat to find a new world and a new life for myself, somewhere in the south. Now I am sailing on the Gulf of Perl with my family, some of my friends and a few of my best warriors.
target: Co-dhiù no co-dheth, bhiodh an nàire orm gu bràth mura dèanainn sabaid an aghaidh nan Tùsanach. Air an adhbhar sin, dh’fhàg mi Fremil air long gus saoghal ’s beatha ùr a lorg dhomh àiteigin gu deas. Tha mi a’ seòladh Camas Pherl le mo theaghlach ’s mo cuideachd a-nis.

source: We landed on an unknown coast and found peaceful rest under the palm trees growing at the shore. But that is about as good as it gets. The truth is: when I woke up this morning, I saw nothing but sand around us.
target: Bhuail sinn tràigh nach aithne dhuinn agus fhuair sinn fois shìtheil fo na craobhan-pailm a tha a’ fàs air an oirthir. Ach ’s ann nach eil deagh naidheachd eile ann. A dh’innse na fìrinn, nuair a dhùisg mi an-diugh, chan fhaca mi ach gainneamh timcheall oirnn.

source: At first, I was naive and hoped that they were peaceful, but as soon as one of them saw me, they charged towards me and started attacking me with their throwing spears. Thanks be to the Gods that I was able to flee and hide myself, before retreating back to our colony under cover of darkness.
target: Nach mise a bha gorm aig an toiseach ’s làn dòchais gum biodh iad sìtheil ach cho luath ’s a mhothaich iad dhomh, ghabh iad orm leis na sleaghan tilgeil aca. Taing do na diathan gun deach leam teicheadh agus m’ fhalach mus do chùlaich mi don tuineachadh againn air an oidhche.

source: The barbarian tribe he mentioned is also a threat. I don’t want to share this land with anyone, as sharing only leads to conflicts and battles, as we saw in our old home. We must defeat the barbarians as well.
target: Tha treubh nan Tùsanach air an do bhruidhinn e ’na bhagairt dhuinn cuideachd. Chan eil mi airson an tìr seo a cho-roinneadh le sluagh eile idir o nach digeadh ach còmhstri is sabaid oirnn mar a thigeadh san t-seann-dhachaigh againn. Feumaidh sinn ruaig a chur air na Tùsanaich cuideachd.

source: Krumta, carpenter of Chat’Karuth
target: Krumta, saor Chat’Karuith

source: Lower the demand for marble columns in the economy settings to four. This will help to save some marble for buildings.
target: Ìslich an t-iarrtas air colbhan marmoir gu ceithir ann an roghainnean na h-eaconamaidh. Cuidichidh seo ach an caomhain sinn beagan marmoir airson togalaichean.

source: By changing the target quantity, you can therefore decide which wares/tools your resources (in this case: iron) should be turned into or whether you would like to save your iron and wait until you know what you will need it for.
target: Nuair a shuidhicheas tu an t-uiread-amais, cuiridh tu romhad dè am bathar/na h-acainnean a thèid a dhèanamh dhen stòras a th’ agad (iarainn sa bhall-eisimpleir seo) no am b’ fhearr leat an t-iarann a ghlèidheadh gus am bi fios agad air dè nì thu leis.

source: This is an advanced spear with a steel tip. It is produced in a weapon smithy and used in a training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 1 to level 2.
target: Seo sleagh leasaichte le barr stàilinn. Saothraichidh tu ann an ceàrdach arm i is thèid a cleachdadh sa champa oideachaidh – le biadh – gus ionnsaigh nan saighdearan oideachadh o leibheil 1 gu leibheil 2.

source: But until that day, many years may pass! For now, we must concentrate on the present, and build a few lumberjack’s houses and a sawmill to produce some basic building materials.
target: Ach nach digeadh an latha ud a dh’aithghearr! Feumaidh sinn ar n-aire a thoirt air an latha an-diugh agus taighean do na coilltearan agus muileann sàbhaidh a thogail gus am faigh sinn stuthan togail bunasach.

source: Boldreth seems more and more torn as the days go by. The spirits of my fellows sink as the cold season approaches, and we are still living in no more than huts and barracks. I never intended to stay out here in the wilderness for so long – but I never thought my brothers would engage in this senseless battle for so long either.
target: Tha Boldrad fo bharrachd uallach gach latha. Tha an leann-dubh a’ tighinn air mo chuideachd on a tha an geamhradh gu bhith tighinn oirnn agus chan eil sinn a’ fuireach ach ann am bothanan. Cha robh mi an dùil fuireach san fhàsach seo cho fada sin – ach cha shaoilinn a-riamh gum maireadh an còmhstri gun chiall seo eadar mo dhà bhràthair cho fada sin.

source: Well done so far. We have produced enough wheat. Now dismantle the farm and build the next building in the production chain.
target: Rinn sinn gu math gu ruige seo. Tha sinn air cruitheachd gu leòr a shaothrachadh. Nise, thoir an tuathanas às a chèile agus tog an togalach a dh’fheumas sinn airson an ath-cheuma.

source: I strongly recommend dismantling most of them to be able to build industrial buildings. I don’t think there is much danger on this island, but if you want to be cautious, you can keep some sentries or blockhouses near the coastline.
target: Mholainn-sa gun doireamaid a mhòrchuid dhiubh às a cèile ach an tog sinn togalaichean gnìomhachais. Cha chreid mi gu bheil torr chunnartan san eilean seo ach ma tha sibh airson a bhith cùramach, nach cum sibh freiceadan no taigh-bloca no dhà faisg air an oirthir?

source: So, first of all we need some building materials to start correcting the mistakes made by the infamous secretary. I think we should try dismantling unproductive small buildings to recover some building materials from them and collect them in our headquarters. As far as I can see now, the fishermen’s houses and the quarries don’t have any resources near them. The lumberjacks’ houses and the wells seem also to be inefficient or worn out.
target: Nise, feumaidh sinn stuthan-togail an toiseach feuch an càirich sinn na mearachdan a rinn an rùnaire droch-chliùiteach. Saoilidh mi gum bu chòir dhuinn na togalaichean beaga gun saothrachadh a thoirt às an cèile ach am faigh sinn cuid a stuthan-togail uapa ’s gun cruinnich sinn sa phrìomh-àras iad. Mhothaich mi gu ruige seo nach eil stòras sam bith faisg air na taighean-iasgair no cuaraidhean. Tha coltas cuideachd gu bheil na taighean coillteir is tobraichean neo-èifeachdach no ro shean.

source: Brother, I'm really worried that I have to deliver bad news again. As you can see, our farms aren’t producing anything and we can’t dismantle them.
target: A bhràthair, tha an t-amharas orm gu bheil droch-naidheachd agam a-rithist. Mar a chì thu, chan eil na tuathanasan againn a’ saothrachadh dad sam bith agus chan urrainn dhuinn an toirt às an cèile.

source: This situation was caused by the sad fact that our people lost the instructions on how to construct and operate farms. Therefore they have zero productivity and the constructors don’t know how to dismantle them either.
target: ’S e an dorch-fhortan gun do chaill ar muinntir na planaichean-togail is obrachaidh nan tuathanasan. Chan fhaigh iad cinneasachd sam bith air a shàilleibh agus chan eil fios aig an luchd-togail mar a chuireas iad às an cèile iad nas motha.

source: Your well established smuggling routes suddenly got busy: two other tribes have appeared and now a rivalry among smugglers has started. Which team will be the first to smuggle a certain number of wares?
target: Dh’fhàs na slighean cùiltearachd stèidhichte agad trang gu h-obann: nochd dà threubh eile ’s tha còmhstri am measg an luchd-cùiltearachd air a tòiseachadh. Cò an sgioba a mhalairteas uiread de bhathar ro chàch?

source: But all seemed well. Only the horses seemed to feel something was wrong. During the nights, they went crazy and were full of fear. It was not long before the horse breeder Xydra figured out what was wrong with them: the sea level in front of their stable was rising with ever increasing speed.
target: Co-dhiù, cha robh dragh air duine. Cha do dh’fhairich ach na h-eich gun robh càil cearr. Bhiodh iad gòrach leis an t-eagal rè na h-oidhche. Cha b’ fhada gus an do thuig an gille-each Xydra na bha cearr orra: bha àirde na mara air beulaibh an stàbaill ag èirigh na bu luaithe ’s na bu luaithe.

source: This is good news indeed, Opol. Our economy is developing very well. Go back to your work now, Opol, and may Satul warm you and all your guild members!
target: Seo deagh naidheachd dha-rìribh, Opol. Tha an eaconamaidh againn a’ fàs glè mhath. Till don obair agad a-nis, Opol agus gum blàthaicheadh Satul thu agus gach bhall de chomann nam breabadair!

source: Today I saw the first recruits gathering in front of the new barracks. If everything goes well, they should receive their training soon.
target: Chunnaic mi na ciad glas-laoich cruinn còmhla air beulaibh an taighe-fheachd ùir an-diugh. Chan fhada gus am faigh iad oideachadh ma thèid leinn mar bu chòir.

source: I received an invitation from Sidolus. The first day of training in the newly finished labyrinth will be tomorrow. The dungeon is done as well and will start its work soon. I am looking forward to tomorrow; I am very interested in how our soldiers are trained, and I wonder if the additional workload will keep them from bullying the civilian population.
target: Fhuair mi cuireadh o Shidolus. Tòisichidh an t-oideachadh sa chuartan ùr an làrna-mhàireach. Tha an toll-dubh air a thogail cuideachd agus tòisichidh e air obair a dh’aithghearr. Tha fiughar agam ri a-màireach; tha mi glè dheònach fiosrachadh mar a thèid na saighdearan againn oideachadh agus chan eil mi cinnteach am foghainn a bharrachd obrach a th’ aca o mhaoidheadh nan sìobhaltach.

source: So you want to prepare us for a longer stay in these forests, Thron? Well, I see the wisdom in doing so, yet my heart is yearning for a glorious return to Al’thunran. Too long have we waited while our brethren have fought on the battlefield, and our axes and swords have turned rusty over time.
target: An ann gu bheil thu airson ar n-ullachadh ach am fuirich sinn sna coilltean seo nas fhaide, a Throin? Uill, tuigidh mi an gliocas a th’ ann, ach tha fadachd ’nam chridhe gus an till sinn gu Al’tùnran gu soirbheachail. Tha sinn air fuireach ro fhada ann a sheo mar-thà fad ’s a tha ar cuideachd a’ sabaid an aghaidh càch a chèile air a’ bhlàr agus tha na tuaghan is claidheamhan againn air am fàs meirgeach.

source: Wonderful! Our roofs are not dripping anymore, and we have all the material we need for, well, whichever monumental building we see fit!
target: Sgoinneil! Chan dig an t-uisge tro ar mullaichean tuilleadh agus tha stuth-togail againn airson… tha… canamaid togalach spaideil mòr sam bith a thogras sinn!

source: He told me about the blockhouse. Well, I don’t think we need more blockhouses – instead, we might concentrate on other things now.
target: Dh’innis e dhomh mun taigh-bhloca. Uill, ar leam chan eil sinn feumach air barrachd taighean-bloca a-nis – bu chòir dhuinn ar n-aire a thoirt air cùisean eile.

source: Lutius, this may seem very tricky, but we can do it. First of all, we need patience as well as speed and a plan to succeed in this part of the world.
target: A Lutius, tha coltas toinnte air ach nì sinn a’ chùis. Feumaidh sinn a bhith foighidinneach is luath is glic gu h-àraidh ach am bitheamaid soirbheachail sa cheàrn seo dhen t-saoghal.

source: I think I have heard the wind carrying some weird but well known sounds from the north. If I’m not totally wrong, I have heard some Barbarian war drums. So, we should better go and have a look at what is going on up there.
target: Cha chreid mi nach cuala mi fuaim a’ tighinn a-steach leis a’ ghaoth, neònach ach cho aithnichte dhuinn. Mur eil mi cearr, ’s e drumaichean-cogaidh nan Tùsanach a chuala mi. Mar sin, b’ fheairrde sinn dol a-null thall feuch am faigh sinn a-mach dè tha a’ tachairt ann.

source: We need some cloth as well for producing armor in our armor smithy. We need it to build some of the training buildings for our soldiers. And most important and most imminent of all, we need it to send out expeditions.
target: Feumaidh sinn clò cuideachd airson armachd a dhèanamh sa cheàrdach armachd againn. Feumaidh sinn clò airson togalaichean oideachaidh a thogail dha ar saighdearan. Agus seo a’ chùis as cudromaiche an-dràsta fhèin, ’s ann nach cuir sinn triall às aonais clòtha idir.

source: Unfortunately, we lost our holy shrine of Neptune in the great storm, so we can’t worship him well. I think we should search the whole region to see if we can recover all six pieces of the shrine.
target: Gu mì-fhortanach, chaill sinn ar n-altair naomh Neaptuin sa ghailleann agus chan urrainn dhuinn ùrnaigh cheart a dhèanamh dha. Saoilidh mi gum bu chòir dhuinn an sgìre shlàn a rùrachadh feuch an gabhamaid na sia leacan aice uile air ais.

source: Sire, we need to train some of our people to serve in your great army. It is important to increase the number of our soldiers as fast as we can. And we should train them well to improve their fighting abilities.
target: A thighearna, feumaidh sinn barrachd dhaoine a thogail dhan arm mhòr againn. Tha e cudromach gun cuir sinn ris na saighdearan againn cho luath ’s a ghabhas. Agus bu chòir dhuinn an oideachadh ach am bi iad nas comasaiche air a’ bhlàr.

source: Oh no! Amalea is right. In fact, I can’t see any productivity at all. And the road network seems to be completely in shambles as well. Who might be responsible for this chaos?
target: Ochan ò! Tha Amalea ceart. A dh’innse na fìrinn, chan fhaic mi cinneasachd sam bith. Agus tha coltas gu bheil lìonra nan rathaidean millte gu lèir. Saoil cò dh’adhbharaich an rù-rà sin?

source: Well done, well done. Our road network looks a lot more structured than before.
target: Glè mhath. Tha coltas mòran nas rianaile air na rathaidean againn a-nis.

source: But according to our recent experiences, I assume that something will be wrong with our mines as well. It’s probably a good idea to send a geologist to check whether there are enough resources in the vicinity of our mines.
target: Ach le mar a dh’èirich dhuinn, tha mi ’n dùil gu bheil ruideigin ceàrr air na mèinnean againn cuideachd. Saoilidh mi gu biodh e glic clach-eòlaiche a chur ach an sgrùd e an talamh timcheall air na mèinnean againn feuch a bheil stòrasan gu leòr ann.

source: We should start by taking care of our wood production. Trees don’t seem to grow well on this island; better build at least two houses for foresters and one for a woodcutter.
target: Bu chòir dhuinn tòiseachadh le saothrachadh fiodha. Tha coltas nach fhàs craobhan glè mhath san eilean seo; b’ fheàirrde sinn co-dhiù dà thaigh a thogail dha na planntairean-coille agus fear dhan bhuaineadair-fhiodha.

source: Build an iron mine and perhaps a gold mine. As they produce only ores, we will need a furnace to smelt them. Also build a blacksmithy to ensure we won’t run out of tools – and yes, a small armor smithy as well. It produces helmets as well as swords. I hope we won’t meet enemies here, but it’s better to be prepared.
target: Togaibh mèinn iarainn agus ’s dòcha mèinn òir. O nach saothraich iad ach clach-mhèinneir, feumaidh sinn fùirneis a thogail gus a leaghadh. Togaibh ceàrdach gobhainn cuideachd a dhèanamh cinnteach nach ruith na h-acainnean oirnn – agus ceàrdach armachd bheag cuideachd. Nì e clogaidean agus claidheamhan. Tha mi ’n dòchas nach tachair sinn ri nàimhdean ann a sheo ach cò aig’ a tha fios.

source: Soldiers are trained in two steps in defense and health. They get fur garments studded with iron and also gold to cushion blows; and helmets forged from iron, and gold as well, to lengthen their life in battle.
target: Thèid dìon is slàinte nan saighdearan oideachadh ann an dà cheum. Gheibh iad còtaichean-bèin reulagaichte le iarann is òr airson an dìon agus clogaidean dèanta le iarann is òr cuideachd ach am mair iad beò nas fhaide air a’ bhlàr.

source: Despair not, I did espy some hope! The easternmost tip of the island, as well as the space where the fiends’ headquarters stood, seems well suited to build a port on. If we manage to construct a ship, and fill it with all we need to build a new settlement, we may be able to escape.
target: Misnichibh on a mhothaich mi gu bheil dòchas againn fhathast! Tha coltas gu bheil ceann an ear an eilein iomchaidh airson port a thogail ann mar bhiodh an àite far an robh prìomh-àras an deamhain. Ma thèid leinn long a thogail ’s ma chuireas sinn innte na dh’fheumas sinn airson tuineachadh ùr a thogail, dh’fhaoidte gun dèid leinn teicheadh.

source: You are right – we should build more berry farms, collector’s houses and taverns as well as a drinking hall, and advanced bakeries and breweries.
target: Tha thu ceart – bu chòir dhuinn barrachd croitean-dhearc, taighean-cruinniche ’s taighean-tàirn a thogail agus talla-òil ’s taighean-fuine ’s taighean-grùide leasaichte cuideachd.

source: I wanted to teach you how to build new flags, but it seems you have already found out on your own. Well done!
target: Bha mi airson ionnsachadh dhut mar a thogas tu bratach ùr, ach tha e agad mar-thà a-rèir coltais. Sin thu fhèin!

source: Here in the northern part, you only have a goldmine and a warehouse. While the miners are supplied well with food, there is no way to transport the gold ore to our smelting works in the southern part.
target: Aig a’ cheann a tuath an-seo, chan eil ach mèinn òir agus taigh-stòrais agad. Fad ’s a tha biadh a dh’fhòghnas aig na mèinnearan, chan eil dòigh ann gus a’ chlach-òir a chur dhan cheàrdach leaghadair ceann a deas.

source: Connected to a computer player (the face in the picture as well as the mouse hover texts indicate the strength of the currently selected computer player).
target: Ceangailte ri cluicheadair coimpiutair (innsidh an dà chuid an t-aodann san dealbh is an teacsa nuair a chumas tu an luchag os a chionn dè cho làidir ’s a tha an cluicheadair coimpiutair a thagh thu an-dràsta).

source: Trains soldiers in Attack up to level 3 as well as in Defense and Health to level 1. Equips the soldiers with all necessary weapons and armor parts.
target: Oidichidh e na saighdearan ann an ionnsaigh gu ruige leibheil 3 agus ann an dìon is slàinte gu ruige leibheil 1. Armaichidh e na saighdearan leis na h-airm is an armachd a dh’fheumas iad.

source: They are used by berry and reed farmers as well as foresters. Clay diggers also need them to dig mud out of hard soil.
target: Cleachdaidh fir nan dearcan, tuathanaich-chuilce agus planntairean-coille iad. Feumaidh digearan-criadha iad cuideachd airson poll a bhuain às an talamh chruaidh.

source: Thatch reed is a special kind of reed that is grown in a reed farm. Nothing is better suited to make roofs waterproof. It is also used to make buckets and fishing nets as well as cloth.
target: ’S e seòrsa sònraichte de chuilceach a tha san fheur thughaidh a thèid a dh’fhàs ann an tuathanas-cuilce. Chan eil gin nas fhearr ach an dìon do mhullach do thaigh on uisge. Thèid a cleachdadh cuideachd airson peilichean, lìontan-èisg is clò a dhèanamh.

source:
‘He loves the animals and to breed them
as we love to cook and eat them.’
target:
“Is esan a bhrideas
is sinne a dh’itheas.”

source: should breed resource type %s, which does not exist in world; tribe is not compatible with world
target: bu chòir dha stòras %s a thàrmachadh nach eil air an t-saoghal seo; mar sin chan eil an treubh co-chòrdail ris an t-saoghal seo

source: Open the Building Window of a Farm
target: Fosgail uinneag tuathanais

source: I think we should have a deeper look into the issue and open the building window of one of them.
target: Saoilidh mi gum bu chòir dhuinn sùil nas gèire a thoirt orra agus am uinneag aig fear dhiubh fhosgladh.

source: The fisher working out of this fisher’s house can’t find any fish in his work area. Remember that you can increase the number of existing fish by building a fish breeder’s house.
target: Cha do lorg an t-iasgair a tha ag obair aig an taigh-iasgair seo iasg sam bith taobh a-staigh an raoin-obrach tuilleadh. Thoir an aire gur urrainn dhut cur ris na tha ann de dh’èisg ma thogas tu ionad-àraich èisg.

source: When Chat’Karuth died, he was an old man, father to three strong and ambitious sons, and warlord to an army that could match any enemy willing to rise against the ancient forests. Though at the end of his glorious reign, Chat’Karuth chose his eldest son, Thron, to succeed him as the tribe’s warlord – a decision that left his two brothers unsatisfied. The old warlord knew that. As his father instructed him, Thron left the capital of Al’thunran, the home of the Throne Among the Trees, and withdrew his forces to the high hills where he buried the corpse of his father. There he swore to the gods and his father’s spirit that he’d return to re-established order. While his brothers have raged blind war against Thron and the few forces he left to secure the borders of Al’thunran, the young warlord seeks to reunite his ambitious brothers and force the tribes to march once again under a common banner.
target: ’S e an ceannard-cogaidh a bh’ ann an Cat’Charud agus stiùirich e feachd a cheannsaicheadh gach nàmhaid a bhiodh deònach èirigh an aghaidh nan seann choilltean. Bha e ’na bhodach nuair a chaochail e ’s triùir mhac glòir-mhiannach treun aige. Ged a thagh Cat’Charud a mhac as sine Tron mar an ceannard-cogaidh ùr aig deireadh a rìoghachd glòrmhor, dh’fhàg an co-dhùnadh aige an dithis bhràithrean eile mì-shàsaichte. Mhothaich an seann tighearna dha. Mar a mhol athair ris, dh’fhàg Tron cathair-bhaile Al’tùnrain, dachaigh cathair nan craobh ’s chùlaich e fheachd dhan mhonadh far an do thìodhlaic e corp athar. Ghabh e bòid dha na diathan ’s dha dh’anam athar gun tilleadh e na cùisean gu mar a b’ àbhaist. Fhad ’s a tha a bhràithrean ri strì gu fiadhaich an aghaidh Throin ’s an fheachd bhig a dh’fhàg e gus crìochan Al’tùnrain a dhìon, tha an tighearna-cogaidh òg ag amas a bhràithrean glòir-mhiannach a rèiteachadh ach am biodh na cinnidhean air an ath-chruinneachadh fon aon bratach a-rithist.

source: It seems as if this magical valley has been inhabited by wisents since the beginning of days. When your tribe came to this place, you were sure that it offered enough space for a peaceful life. But can your tribe live in peace with your neighbors?
target: Bhiodh tairbh-allaidh beò sa ghleann dhraoidheach seo o shean. Nuair a thàinig do chuideachd dhan àite seo, bha sibh cinnteach gun robh rum gu leòr ann airson beatha sìtheil. Ach am bi sìth eadaraibh fhèin ’s ur nàbaidhean?

source: Chieftain Arldor’s retort when he was asked why his tribe can’t drink salt water
target: Na dh’fhreagair an ceannard Arldor nuair a chaidh fhaighneachd dha carson nach gabh a chuideachd sàl

source: ‘A new warrior’s ax brings forth the best in its wielder – or the worst in its maker.’
target: “Nì tuagh as fhearr an gaisgeach a bhuaileas.”

source: You should assign the new reed farm the highest priority for thatch reed in the construction site window.
target: Bu chòir dhut am prìomhachas as àirde a chur air an fheur tughaidh ann an uinneag làrach togail an tuathanais-chuilce ùir.

source: On Windows, you can find the file called COPYING.txt in the installation folder, and the Widelands Start menu entry provides a link to this file.
target: Air Windows, lorgaidh tu am faidhle air a bheil COPYING.txt sa phasgan stàlaidh is bheir an t-innteart aig Widelands sa chlàr-taice tòiseachaidh ceangal dhan fhaidhle seo dhut.

source: Replays are a very useful tool to find bugs in the game logic, so they can be useful as attachments to bug reports. The replay files are saved in the %s directory on Linux and Mac OS X. On Windows, they are in the ‘replays’ subdirectory of your Widelands installation.
target: ’S e uidheamachd glè fheumail gus bugaichean ann an loidsig a’ gheama a lorg a th’ anns na h-ath-chluichean, mar sin bidh iad feumail ma cheanglas tu ri aithris air buga iad. Thèid na h-ath-chluichean a shàbhaladh sa phasgan %s air Linux is Mac OS X. Air Windows, bidh iad ann am pasgan “replays” fon phasgan stàlaidh Widelands agad.

source: Excellent. Do you remember how to close windows? You simply have to right-click on them. This will work with all windows except for story message windows like this one. Go ahead and try it.
target: Taghta. A bheil chuimhne agad air mar a dhùineas tu uinneag? Cha leig thu leas ach briogadh oirre le putan deas na luchaige. Obraichidh seo leis a h-uile uinneag ach uinneagan sgeulachd a leithid an tè seo. Siuthad is feuch e.

source: Failed to host the server!
target: Cha b’ urrainn dhuinn am frithealaiche òstadh!
